nav.div: Wyomissing Area School District » Departments » Health Services » Coronavirus

div.p: The Wyomissing Area School District (WASD) is committed to maintaining a safe environment for students, parents, and the community. The goal of this plan is to outline the educational practices that could potentially occur during this prolonged school closure due to the Coronavirus pandemic. It is important that students have the opportunity to maintain and develop skills while away from the customary school environment.

p.a: Please click here for a pdf of the Continuity of Education Plan

div.p: This section of our website provides informational links and resources relative to the Coronavirus. The Wyomissing Area School District will continue to network with the PA Department of Health, the Pennsylvania Department of Education and Berks County to learn about this issue and take appropriate steps to serve our students, employees and community members.
We will continue to provide resources below as new information becomes available:
